extendedInfo.description: PaymentMax is a leading provider of payment processing solutions. We are here for all types of businesses including: retail, restaurant, services, wireless, telephone and mail order, Internet, and many more. Thousands of small to mid-sized businesses rely on PaymentMax to simply, securely, and efficiently get money into their accounts. To learn more, visit www.paymentmax.comFeatures:* Turn your smartphone into a credit card terminal: Charge customer credit cards instantly and securely* No Special hardware required. All you need is your smartphone & a PaymentMax Merchant Account* No Need to Purchase Expensive Wireless Credit Card Terminals with High Wireless Fees* Email receipts â With every successful transaction, an email of the transaction can be automatically sent to the customerCredit Card ReaderApply now at: http://www.paymentmax.com/apply-now/ Our Mission: To serve merchants with the best payment processing solutions, lowest rates, quickest funding, and exceptional customer service.About Paymentmax: PaymentMax Processing processes hundreds of millions of dollars in payment transactions each year. PaymentMax is one of the leading independent transaction service providers in this country, growing rapidly thanks to relevant, competitive offerings and one-call 24/7 customer service.PaymentMax is a U.S. company that was incorporated in 2004 to provide credit and debit card processing that merchants found affordable, easy, and cost-effective. The company serves professionals and merchants throughout the U.S., focusing on giving retailers, wholesalers, restaurants, healthcare businesses, and others the edge with products and services they need and want.PaymentMax started based on a simple concept: A reputable, professional company to provide transaction processing services with integrity, high quality and relevance, and exceptional customer service. And itâs working for thousands upon thousands of successful customers â and their customers!Paymentmax is a registered ISO/MSP for Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. Walnut Creek, CA. Powered by First Data Corporation. All trademarks, service marks and trade names referenced in this material are the property of their respective owners. *Restrictions apply and on approved credit. reviews.comment: Kevin Bullis
reviews.author: kevin bullis

reviews.title: Read the fine print Monthly Charge
reviews.comment: Thought this would be a great alternative to Square. NOT. While the transaction% is lower, there is also a per transaction fee. And well as a minimum $50 per month. Might as well deal with the bank for $35 a month! Plus, if you are a seasonal vendor, you are still charged the $50 a month even if you have no sales.
reviews.author: Tam Noneedforalastname

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great app with lots of good and valuable information!

reviews.comment: This app is so fun and easy to use. Paymentmax is actually great for credit card processing with no hidden fees.

reviews.title: Brilliant idea!
reviews.comment: I am a happy customer of the service provided by this app. Gives unexpected convenience and the whole concept is very simple to understand.
reviews.author: Fred Jonathan

reviews.title: Incredible
reviews.comment: This is by far, the best app in the credit card processing industry. The app also is a great educational tool with cool videos and informative blogs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fabulous
reviews.comment: As I dont have to purchase expensive wireless credit card terminals with high fees so I am able to save money. Its awesome.
reviews.author: Ryan Gibs

reviews.title: THIEVES!!!!
reviews.comment: So I thought this company sounded great so I filled out an application and emailed it in. I was supposed to hear in 24 hours. 15 days later I got the approval email.  The THIEVES part comes in that my app went in last month but I didn\'t hear until Jan 3rd I was approved.  In the meantime they charged me $89 in fees on Jan 2nd for December fees when I didn\'t even have approval notification until Jan 3rd!! No one at the company answers the phone or returns email for me to get this straightened out!!!! I emailed them on Jan 5th regarding the charge and no one responded.  I have emailed 2 other times - no response.  Their phone system for \"24/7\" support tells you to email then hangs up on you!  Do not trust these people!
reviews.author: Andrea Riklin

reviews.title: rate sheet difficult
reviews.comment: couldn\'t understand the rate sheet. never had a chance to look at the app locked until they unlocker for some reason. if it was just kept simple ???

reviews.title: Extraordinary
reviews.comment: It is growing rapidly. All the due credit goes to its relevant, competitive offerings and one call 24/7 customer service.
reviews.author: Michael Johnson

reviews.title: Convenient!
reviews.comment: My android device has turned into a credit card terminal. Charged my credit cards instantly and safely, no issues of confusion.
reviews.author: Kevin Richardson

reviews.title: Scam Artists--undisclosed fees
reviews.comment: I applied on February 27th and to-date haven\'t received an approval letter nor instructions on how to obtain a swiper or account information to use the programs. What I did receive was a notice that my bank account had Bern charged $50.00! Square Up is much more honest and upfront. My account ws opened in minutes either them. STAY AWAY FROM PAYMENTMAX.  You\'ve been forewarned...
